Keywords: Celebrity , Deity , Eternal , Past , Pirate
Real Name: Sprite
Special Powers
LEGEND OF THE PAST: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Sprite this turn.
JUST A CHILD: Shape Change. When Sprite uses it, if there is another friendly character within the attacker's range and line of fire, increase her Shape Change roll +1.
COCKEREL CROW: Probability Control. Once per turn for all characters with this effect, when she uses Probability Control during an opponent's turn, modify the target character's damage -1 this turn.

Goop
A very top heavy dial, those first 3 clicks are WAY better than her last 3. I love the prob effect but at 75pt i dont know if the cost is worth it. She's your basic blades/SS/SC piece, if the dice roll well you love her and if they dont you'll hate her.
